EINSTEIN GENERATIVE AI
Manage Prompt Templates

Fine-tune your prompt template in Prompt Builder by using versions, activation and deactivation, changing LLM configurations, and more.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Sales, Einstein for Platform, or Einstein for Service add-on
Standard Prompt Templates
Use standard prompt templates as starting points for typical use cases. Save copies to customize them for your business.
Activate and Deactivate Prompt Templates
Use activation and deactivation of prompt templates to finely control which version your users can access.
Use Multiple Versions of a Prompt Template
Create and use multiple versions of prompt templates in Prompt Builder to compare prompt constructions and their responses.
Changing LLM Configurations
Select and optionally modify an LLM configuration for generating outputs in Prompt Builder.
